faqs.question: What is TrueCircle?
faqs.answer: TrueCircle is an emotional AI companion that helps you understand, manage, and strengthen your relationships through intelligent reflection, guided exercises, and personalized insights.

faqs.question: How does TrueCircle work?
faqs.answer: TrueCircle analyzes your daily reflections, conversations, and emotional patterns to offer meaningful insights. It uses AI-based relationship analysis without judgment to help you grow emotionally and socially.

faqs.question: Is my data safe with TrueCircle?
faqs.answer: Yes. TrueCircle prioritizes your privacy and never shares personal data with third parties. All your entries remain fully encrypted and accessible only to you.

faqs.question: What is the ‘Relationship Depth Analysis’ feature?
faqs.answer: It’s an AI-based evaluation of how deep or balanced your relationships are, based on your own reflections and conversations. It helps you see emotional trends over time.

faqs.question: What does ‘Sample Mode’ mean?
faqs.answer: Sample Mode allows you to explore the app using demo data without saving real entries. It’s useful for learning how the app works before using it personally.

faqs.question: How can I reload or refresh sample data?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings → Data → Reload Sample Data. This action clears the cache and re-fetches demo content from the local JSON data source.

faqs.question: Can I use TrueCircle offline?
faqs.answer: Yes, TrueCircle supports offline functionality. You can record reflections and access previous insights without an internet connection. Data syncs automatically when you reconnect.

faqs.question: Who can use TrueCircle?
faqs.answer: Anyone seeking emotional growth, better relationships, or self-awareness — including individuals, couples, and families — can use TrueCircle safely and effectively.

faqs.question: Does TrueCircle provide therapy?
faqs.answer: No. TrueCircle is not a substitute for professional therapy. It provides AI-guided emotional assistance and insights to complement your personal growth journey.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach us via the in-app Support tab or email us at support@truecircle.ai. We’re available 24/7 to assist you.
